description:
“Your lips are really sexy,” Alexander said as he was rubbing Miles’ arm.
Miles laughed. “Thanks!” he said nervously.
Alexander leaned in and gave him a kiss, and then another. “That was nice,” he said.
The two of them seemed to be hitting it off right away. I’m don’t think that Alexander was aware of one minor detail though. It’s always the skinny guys who are packing the big cocks and Miles is no exception!
Alexander slowly worked his way down and he slipped off Miles’ pants.
“Whoa!” he said as he saw Miles’ cock for the first time. “Damn...”
One of the things I liked best about this film is that Miles really made Alexander howl! He gave it to him deep and Alexander wasn’t afraid to let go!
title: Miles & Alexander: Bareback
